name: Toma and poyo
description:
Be ready to think because now you will need to participate in the construction battle. It doesn't matter how high you can climb, the main thing is whether you can climb with your friend. Take your friend with you and test your abilities.

Control of the right character (WSDA(Run \ Tetris) - Space (Jump) - E(Acceleration of the falling block in Tetris (Must be clamped))

Control of the left character (Arrows (Run \ Tetris) - Right shift (Jump) - M (Acceleration of the falling block in Tetris (Must be clamped))

Transferring an item to another player is the H key.

The goal of the game is to touch the white cube together from above. If one player touches the cube and the other touches the lava, both will lose. If your teammate has problems, and you got a great item, then you can pass it by clicking on H. Have a good game!
